PHRASE.LANG: Here you can buy additional packs of music for the Musicality game – either Rock or R&B. The t-shirts will automatically unlock the music inside the game.
Ici, vous pouvez acheter des packs de musique supplémentaires pour le jeu Musicality en choisissant entre Rock et R&B. Les t-shirts permettent de débloquer automatiquement la musique dans le jeu.
Hier kann man weitere Musik-Sets für das Musicality-Spiel erwerben – entweder Rock oder R&B. Die T-Shirts schalten die Musik im Spiel automatisch frei.
Qui puoi acquistare pacchetti aggiuntivi per il gioco Musicality: Rock o R&B. Le t-shirt sbloccheranno automaticamente la musica all'interno del gioco.
Aquí puedes comprar paquetes de música adicionales para el juego Musicality, ya sea Rock o R&B. Las camisetas desbloquearán automáticamente la música del juego.
Here you can buy additional packs of music for the Musicality game – either Rock or R&B. The t-shirts will automatically unlock the music inside the game.
Here you can buy additional packs of music for the Musicality game – either Rock or R&B. The t-shirts will automatically unlock the music inside the game.
